tool.name: legsta
tool.command:
#import re #set safe_names=[]
#for $i in $contigs #set safe_name=re.sub('[^\s\w\-.]', '_', str($i.element_identifier)) $safe_names.append($safe_name) ln -s '$i' '$safe_name'; #end for
legsta
$noheader $csv
#for $safe_name in $safe_names '$safe_name' #end for
> '$output'

param.name: contigs
param.label: Contigs
param.help: One or more input files in FASTA, FASTQ, Genbank, EMBL, Clustal, Stockholm or GFF format.

param.label: Remove table header
param.help: Removes the table header from the output (ie. FILE SBT flaA ...)

param.label: CSV output
param.help: Prints the output in comma-separated value format instead of tab-separated value format.

tool.help:
In silico sequence based typing (SBT) of Legionella pneumophila.
The purpose of the Legionella pneumophila SBT scheme is to provide a rapid and easily comparable method for the epidemiological typing of clinical and environmental isolates of Legionella pneumophila in outbreak investigations.
